Title: Managing your enterprise, organization and repos on GitHub
Description:
Learn how to manage your GitHub enterprise with a top-down governance approach. In this video, we explore the powerful options available to administrators, from setting repository policies to configuring GitHub Copilot and security settings. See how settings flow from the enterprise to the organization and down to the repository.

#Enterprise #Governance #GitHub
